div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 924 Strojno (formerly Sveti Ilija), c. 30 km. S of Jambol, Bulgaria, 1961 Burial: c. 125-100 B.C.? (T) Contents: 193 AR. Pot hoard Maroneia: 60 spread-flan tetradr. Macedonia, 1st Region: 3 tetradr. Thasos: 126 spread-flan tetradr. (18 bar- baric) Athens: 4 New Style tetradr. Disposition: Jambol Gerasimov, BIAB 26 (1963), p. 265
